mapper.select: SELECT id, name, kanaName, nickname, email, area, age, sex, remark, deleted FROM students WHERE deleted IS NULL OR deleted = 0 ORDER BY id
SELECT id, name, kanaName, nickname, email, area, age, sex, remark, deleted FROM students WHERE id = #{id} AND (deleted IS NULL OR deleted = 0)

SELECT sc.id, sc.student_id as studentId, sc.course_name as courseName, sc.course_start_at as courseStartAt, sc.course_end_at as courseEndAt, es.id as 'enrollmentStatus.id', es.course_id as 'enrollmentStatus.courseId', es.status as 'enrollmentStatus.status' FROM students_courses sc LEFT JOIN enrollment_status es ON sc.id = es.course_id ORDER BY sc.student_id, sc.id

SELECT sc.id, sc.student_id as studentId, sc.course_name as courseName, sc.course_start_at as courseStartAt, sc.course_end_at as courseEndAt, es.id as 'enrollmentStatus.id', es.course_id as 'enrollmentStatus.courseId', es.status as 'enrollmentStatus.status' FROM students_courses sc LEFT JOIN enrollment_status es ON sc.id = es.course_id WHERE sc.student_id = #{studentId} ORDER BY sc.id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO students(name, kanaName, nickname, email, area, age, sex, remark) VALUES (#{name}, #{kanaName}, #{nickname}, #{email}, #{area}, #{age}, #{sex}, #{remark})
INSERT INTO students_courses(student_id, course_name, course_start_at, course_end_at) VALUES(#{studentId}, #{courseName}, #{courseStartAt}, #{courseEndAt})
mapper.update: UPDATE students SET deleted = 1 WHERE id = #{id}
